description.en:
I died in an accident while I was chased by debt collectors. Then I transmigrated into the book *The Fairy's Garden*, but why did I have to possess the villainess?!

Aine le Peregrine, an infamous *femme fatale*, was the villainess. Besides harassing the heroine, she also has a peculiar hobby of collecting beautiful men. But in the end, she died at the hands of the men she collected…

No, I can't die like this! Alright! Starting today, my goal is to say farewell.

---
I need to safely break up with these men immediately!

"The reason I came to the duchy today is not to break off the engagement, but to tell you I have no intention of breaking off the engagement."

…Why is this man acting like this? The Grand Duke who should be falling in love with the heroine does not want to break off our engagement. Not only him, but the unfathomable Assassin King J and the wolf-man that brings out my motherly instinct, Shion… The more I try to get rid of them, the harder they stick onto me. Will I be able to safely break up with these three men and preserve my life?!

---
Ayne le Poregrin has three "trophies" in her collection of men: a reluctant fiancé held hostage by his debts, a fickle assassin paid to be her lover, and a soulless pet dog won at a slave auction. But to suddenly wake up one day as this femme fatale is the worst possible surprise. As the villainess of the novel *The Fairy Garden*, the new "Ayne" is fated to die a painful death at the hands of her very own trophies! To sidestep her grim future, she knows she'll need to break up with all three. As soon as she tries to say goodbye, however, each man becomes attached and won't leave her alone! Can Ayne turn their affections towards the story's heroine and save her own life in the process? Based on the hit novel.

---
[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=54889995)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/i-bid-you-adieu)
* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/i-bid-you-adieu-fr)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Harapan-tuk-Berpisah/3426)
description.fr:
Qui aurait cru qu'un jour je me réveillerais dans l'univers de ce roman que j'aime tant? Vivre une vie pauvre et tragique, mourir de la même manière... puis me réveiller dans le corps d'Ayne le Poregrin, la sublime et riche femme fatale du livre *Le Jardin enchanté*, c'est donc cela mon destin? Mais je ne compte pas mener la même vie qu'Ayne! Après tout, elle finit par mourir, elle aussi, et je veux profiter de cette nouvelle chance pour avoir une belle vie. Il va falloir que je coupe les ponts avec tous les hommes de sa collection afin de me protéger, mais je sens que cette tâche ne sera pas une mince affaire...

---
[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=54889995)
